description: This Java class 'TicketRow' represents a data transfer object (DTO) encapsulating details of a parsed row from an uploaded Excel file related to tickets. It contains fields such as ticket ID, timestamps, application name, response/resolution times, SLA adherence percentages, and month information, along with constructors, getters, and setters.

classes.name: TicketRow
classes.description: A DTO representing a single parsed row from the uploaded Excel file, including ticket details and metrics.

methods.name: TicketRow
methods.description: Default constructor for TicketRow class.

methods.name: TicketRow
methods.description: Parameterized constructor to initialize all fields of TicketRow.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ticket ID.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the created timestamp.

methods.name: getResolvedAt
methods.description: Returns the resolution timestamp.

methods.name: getApplication
methods.description: Returns the application name associated with the ticket.

methods.name: getResponseMinutes
methods.description: Returns the response time in minutes.

methods.name: getResolveMinutes
methods.description: Returns the resolution time in minutes.

methods.name: getResponseSlaPercent
methods.description: Returns the response SLA adherence percentage.

methods.name: getResolutionSlaPercent
methods.description: Returns the resolution SLA adherence percentage.

methods.name: getMonth
methods.description: Returns the month derived from createdAt.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the ticket ID.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the created timestamp.

methods.name: setResolvedAt
methods.description: Sets the resolution timestamp.

methods.name: setApplication
methods.description: Sets the application name.

methods.name: setResponseMinutes
methods.description: Sets the response time in minutes.

methods.name: setResolveMinutes
methods.description: Sets the resolution time in minutes.

methods.name: setResponseSlaPercent
methods.description: Sets the response SLA adherence percentage.

methods.name: setResolutionSlaPercent
methods.description: Sets the resolution SLA adherence percentage.

methods.name: setMonth
methods.description: Sets the month string.
